metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3417 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the ff_h264_free_tables function inlibavcodec/h264.c in FFmpeg before 2.3.6 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via craftedH.264 data in an MP4 file, as demonstrated by an HTML VIDEO element thatreferences H.264 data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
